author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Suzhou Good-Ark Electronics to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on May 9
text:
April 27 (Reuters) - Suzhou Good-Ark Electronics Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.3 yuan(before tax)/10 shares for 2017 to shareholders of record on May 8
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 9 and the dividend will be paid on May 9
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/dzM64T
